name: Link Earthraze
text:
You can use this Skill if your Extra Deck contains an EARTH Link Monster.
1: At the beginning of the Duel, gain 1500 Life Points.
2: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can choose 1 Link Monster on your field, and it gains 300 ATK until the end of this turn. If an EARTH monster is on your field or in your Graveyard, the chosen monster gains an additional 300 ATK until the end of this turn.
